attributes.action: Ban the importing of live or dead poultry while bird flu is rife
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Surely it makes sense to protect the general population, as well as our wild birds that we should ban the importing of poultry while bird flu is rife.  The sight of thousands of turkeys being destroyed at the Bernard Mathews farms is one I hope to never see again in this country - lets try and stop it.
